pages.text: The next pages list all possible summons you can create with a $(l:archon:necromancy/undead_staff)Staff of Undead$(). The 'base lifetime' refers to the number of seconds the summons last with 0 Soul Power.

pages.title: Pack of Hounds
pages.text: Summons a pack of five angry wolves to fight by your side. Base Lifetime: 20

pages.title: The Titan
pages.text: Summons The Titan, a fast-moving golem with a devasting attack. Base Lifetime: 25

pages.title: Twin Knights
pages.text: Summons two undead knights with randomly enchanted swords and a shield. Base Lifetime: 20

pages.title: Silver Swarm
pages.text: Summons a swarm of life stealing silverfish to attack your enemies. Base Lifetime: 10

pages.title: Archer
pages.text: Summons an undead archer with a powerful fire bow that can scale damage with soul power. Base Lifetime: 15
